attributes.action: Double up the armed security in our British airports, schools and important buildings so that we're ready to take out any threats
attributes.additional_details: Get Britain ready to defend our country from any terrorist threats. Double up armed border security, airport security and any other security issues. Every security officer should be armed so it's a fair fight against any armed threat allowing security to shoot on site of threat and shoot to kill. People that send threats to our country or attack our country don't deserve a life in our society. None of us real British people don't want no weak minded British persons who took them selfs to join jihadist groups back in our British country.
